name: The Binding
description:
It is our student assignment project, we are total newbies in the rpg maker so please be understanding  with the eventual bugs.

 Theme of the Moment of Grief : The binding is a short game about a man named Cane who's calm and easygoing life with his loving wife becomes a nightmare the night she disappears. He must desperately fight his way through the paranormal and the many mysteries of the cult to find his spouse all culminating in a moment of grief.

 Bonus Challenges : We have not implemented any

Controls

Character moves on the arrow keys and interacts by pressing the "Z" or the "Enter" buttons.
